short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developed for monitoring, proctoring, and anti-cheating to ensure assessment integrity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimplifiedIQ Proctoring: Ensuring Integrity and Security in Online Assessments
 
SimplifiedIQ’s proctoring solution is designed to maintain the highest standards of academic integrity through advanced monitoring and security features. These include:
 
	•	Assessment Frame Boundary: Alerts users when their cursor moves outside the designated assessment window, preventing unauthorized actions.
	•	Tab Management: Automatically closes all other tabs before an assessment begins and blocks the opening of new tabs during the test, ensuring focus and preventing access to external resources.
	•	Clipboard and Printing Controls: Disables copying, pasting, printing, and right-clicking during assessments to safeguard against data breaches and cheating.
	•	Single Screen Enforcement: Ensures that only one screen is active during the test, blocking connections to external devices like HDMI or USB drives.
	•	Eyes and Face Tracking: Monitors and analyzes eye and facial movements to detect and report any suspicious behavior during the exam.
 
These robust features work together to create a secure and controlled testing environment, allowing educators to administer exams with confidence and trust in the results.

Privacy policy: https://simplifiediq.com/privacy-policy/
